issue.title: [CF 191] Dual Spec. mode
issue.body:
Hi,

First of all thank you for a great addon.

Quick question/suggestion (to the newest version, downloaded yday).

Is there any option that could make TMW spec-specific.
I play a mage and a warr, and on my mage It would be great if I could configure it to track e.g. combustion and flame orb when fire, but then switch to Deep Freeze and Icy Veins when frost.

TLDR: Is there a way to switch between 2 sets of TMW configs?

Thank you VERY much in advance, I love your addon


> Posted by CurseForge user benjaminmin | Imported from CurseForge issue #191 | Raw

comments.body:
This functionality has existed in TMW since Ulduar. Check the settings of each group ("/tmw options", expand the groups header)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
